summary: Experienced software developer with 8 years of expertise in React JS frontend and Java Spring Boot backend development. Proven track record in delivering exceptional web solutions, excelling in cross-functional teams. Passionate about leveraging industry trends to drive innovation and excellence, with a strong desire to use developed software to help people.
